text.div:
ImagingExaminationResultStatusValues

Set of values for the imaging examination result status.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/imaging-examination-result-stat defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
1 RegisteredNo result yet available.
2 InterimThis is an initial or interim result: data may be missing or verification has not been performed.
3 FinalThe result is complete and verified by the responsible radiologist.
4 AmendedThe result has been modified subsequent to being Final, and is complete and verified by the radiologist.
5 Cancelled/AbortedThe result is not available because the examination was not started or completed.

name: ImagingExaminationResultStatusValues
description: Set of values for the imaging examination result status.

concept.definition: This is an initial or interim result: data may be missing or verification has not been performed.
The result is complete and verified by the responsible radiologist.
The result has been modified subsequent to being Final, and is complete and verified by the radiologist.
The result is not available because the examination was not started or completed.
